LanguageData.SleepingSpot_Blueprint_Install.label: sleeping spot (청사진)
LanguageData.BagBed.label: 침낭
LanguageData.BagBed.description: 야외에서 잠을 잘 때 쓸수있는 가벼운 침낭입니다.
LanguageData.BagBed_Blueprint.label: 침낭 (청사진)
LanguageData.BagBed_Blueprint_Install.label: 침낭 (청사진)
LanguageData.BagBed_Frame.label: 침낭 (건설 중)
LanguageData.BagBed_Frame.description: 야외에서 잠을 잘 때 쓸수있는 가벼운 침낭입니다.
LanguageData.HayBed.label: 건초 침대
LanguageData.HayBed.description: 건초와 나뭇가지 몇개로 잠을 잘 수 있는 잠자리를 만듭니다. 맨바닥보다는 훨씬 낫습니다.
LanguageData.HayBed_Blueprint.label: 건초 침대 (청사진)
LanguageData.HayBed_Blueprint_Install.label: 건초 침대 (청사진)
LanguageData.HayBed_Frame.label: 건초 bed (건설 중)
LanguageData.HayBed_Frame.description: 건초와 나뭇가지 몇개로 잠을 잘 수 있는 잠자리를 만듭니다. 맨바닥보다는 훨씬 낫습니다.
LanguageData.Bedroll.label: 가죽 침대
LanguageData.Bedroll.description: 동물의 가죽과 통나무로 만든 튼튼한 침대입니다.
LanguageData.Bedroll_Blueprint.label: 가죽 침대 (청사진)
LanguageData.Bedroll_Blueprint_Install.label: 가죽 침대 (청사진)
LanguageData.Bedroll_Frame.label: 가죽 침대 (건설 중)
LanguageData.Bedroll_Frame.description: 동물의 가죽과 통나무로 만든 튼튼한 침대입니다.
LanguageData.BedrollDouble.label: 가죽 큰 침대
LanguageData.BedrollDouble.description: 동물의 가죽과 통나무로 만든 튼튼한 침대입니다. 두 명이 같이 특별한 용도로 사용할 수 있습니다.
LanguageData.BedrollDouble_Blueprint.label: 가죽 큰 침대 (청사진)
LanguageData.BedrollDouble_Blueprint_Install.label: 가죽 큰 침대 (청사진)
LanguageData.BedrollDouble_Frame.label: 가죽 큰 침대 (건설 중)
LanguageData.BedrollDouble_Frame.description: 동물의 가죽과 통나무로 만든 튼튼한 침대입니다. 두 명이 같이 특별한 용도로 사용할 수 있습니다.
LanguageData.Bedroll.label: 푹신푹신한 침대
LanguageData.Bedroll.description: 딱딱한 가죽침대에 건초를 집어 넣어 부드럽게 만든 아주 좋은 침대입니다. 눕기만하면 곯아떨어진거 같습니다.
LanguageData.Bedroll_Blueprint.label: 푹신푹신한 침대 (청사진)
LanguageData.Bedroll_Blueprint_Install.label: 푹신푹신한 침대 (청사진)
LanguageData.Bedroll_Frame.label: 푹신푹신한 침대 (건설 중)
LanguageData.Bedroll_Frame.description: 딱딱한 가죽침대에 건초를 집어 넣어 부드럽게 만든 아주 좋은 침대입니다. 눕기만하면 곯아떨어진거 같습니다. 두 명이 같이 사용할 수 있습니다.

LanguageData.BedrollDouble.description: 딱딱한 가죽침대에 건초를 집어 넣어 부드럽게 만든 아주 좋은 침대입니다. 눕기만하면 곯아떨어진거 같습니다.

LanguageData.industrial_single_bed.label: 현대식 침대
LanguageData.industrial_single_bed.description: 현대적 소재들로 만들어진 매우 편안한 맞춤 침대입니다. 거주민들은 편히 쉬고 열심히 일할 수 있습니다.
LanguageData.industrial_single_bed_Blueprint.label: 현대식 침대 (청사진)
LanguageData.industrial_single_bed_Frame.label: 현대식 침대 (건설 중)
LanguageData.industrial_single_bed_Frame.description: 현대적 소재들로 만들어진 매우 편안한 맞춤 침대입니다. 거주민들은 편히 쉬고 열심히 일할 수 있습니다.

LanguageData.industrial_double_bed.description: 현대적 소재들로 만들어진 매우 편안한 맞춤 침대입니다. 거주민들은 편히 쉬고 열심히 일할 수 있습니다. 두 명이 같이 사용할 수 있습니다.

LanguageData.prison_single_bed_RT.label: 죄수용 침대 (R)
LanguageData.prison_single_bed_RT.description: A bed on a 벽for your prisoners. Fits only one. No effort was spared to craftthis bed look like it came out of the darkest deepest dungeon. The least amount of comfort and a hard surface to sleep will let your prisoners stay alert to finer things of their stay. An art well known among the medieval lords of the Rimworlds.
LanguageData.prison_single_bed_RT_Blueprint.label: 죄수용 침대 (R) (청사진)
LanguageData.prison_single_bed_RT_Frame.label: 죄수용 침대 (R) (건설 중)
LanguageData.prison_single_bed_RT_Frame.description: A bed on a 벽for your prisoners. Fits only one. No effort was spared to craftthis bed look like it came out of the darkest deepest dungeon. The least amount of comfort and a hard surface to sleep will let your prisoners stay alert to finer things of their stay. An art well known among the medieval lords of the Rimworlds.
LanguageData.prison_single_bed_LB.label: 죄수용 침대 (L)
LanguageData.prison_single_bed_LB.description: A bed on a wall for your prisoners. Fits only one. No effort was spared to craftthis bed look like it came out of the darkest deepest dungeon. The least amount of comfort and a hard surface to sleep will let your prisoners stay alert to finer things of their stay. An art well known among the medieval lords of the Rimworlds.

LanguageData.MilleniumDoubleBed.description: 미래지향적인 큰 침대 Line Double bed.

LanguageData.PodBed.label: 우주선 침대
LanguageData.PodBed.description: A futuristic bed with high rest effectiveness.
LanguageData.PodBed_Blueprint.label: 우주선 침대 (청사진)
LanguageData.PodBed_Blueprint_Install.label: 우주선 침대 (청사진)
LanguageData.PodBed_Frame.label: 우주선 침대 (건설 중)
LanguageData.PodBed_Frame.description: A futuristic bed with high rest effectiveness.
LanguageData.space_double_bed.label: 우주선 큰 침대
LanguageData.space_double_bed.description: A comfy bed. Fits two. On the task of "going to space" this bed was literally first developed as a small spacecraft. After this fatal first mistake the possibility to sleep inside and a bit more comfort was added. This didn't prevent the advertising agency from using the terms "fly in your sleep" and "sleeping on clouds". After several lawsuits from customers with strange injuries the advertisment changed to a more down-to-earth direction.
LanguageData.space_double_bed_Blueprint.label: 우주선 큰 침대 (청사진)
LanguageData.space_double_bed_Blueprint_Install.label: 우주선 큰 침대 (청사진)
LanguageData.space_double_bed_Frame.label: 우주선 큰 침대 (건설 중)
LanguageData.space_double_bed_Frame.description: A comfy bed. Fits two. On the task of "going to space" this bed was literally first developed as a small spacecraft. After this fatal first mistake the possibility to sleep inside and a bit more comfort was added. This didn't prevent the advertising agency from using the terms "fly in your sleep" and "sleeping on clouds". After several lawsuits from customers with strange injuries the advertisment changed to a more down-to-earth direction.
LanguageData.cryo_single_bed.label: 동면관 침대
LanguageData.cryo_single_bed.description: A comfy crypto bed. Fits one. During the 연구 of 동면 the possibilty of a short sleeping cycle based on this technology emerged. However most people still refuse to use these beds in fear of never waking up or losing several years by accident. This lead to several Rimworld legends although all exposed by scientists as fictional storys many people fear the device.
LanguageData.cryo_single_bed_Blueprint.label: 동면관 침대 (청사진)
LanguageData.cryo_single_bed_Blueprint_Install.label: 동면관 침대 (청사진)

LanguageData.cryo_double_bed.description: 동면관 큰 침대 Fits two. During the 연구 of 동면 the possibilty of a short sleeping cycle based on this technology emerged. However most people still refuse to use these beds in fear of never waking up or losing several years by accident. LanguageData.AdvHospitalBed.label: 고급 병원 침대
LanguageData.AdvHospitalBed.description: An advanced bed specially designed to treat injured people. Improves the chance of successful medical work even more than the hospital bed.
